guide.title: Treecleaners Project: Maintainer-Needed packages
guide.abstract: Automatically generated list for maintainer-needed packages

section.title: Which packages are marked as maintainer-needed

body.p: Packages which do not have an active maintainer to take care of them are marked as maintainer-needed. This means that they will gonna rot or be removed from portage tree unless someone steps up and take care of them. You are free to do it your self if you feel like it. More information about maintainer-needed packages you may find on treecleaners project page. Gentoo developers and users are encouraged to pick up maintenance for maintainer-needed packages. Users can become maintainers for packages via the proxy-maintainer process. If you would like to see which of your installed packages are orphaned, you could use this python script developed by Ewoud Kohl Van Wijngaarden.
The following 725 packages are marked as maintainer-needed

tr.ti: A webserver log analyzer
